QString baseAddress_
 OPTIONAL spirit:baseAddress Specifies the starting address of the address space.

 OPTIONAL attribute spirit:prompt Allows the setting of a string for the configuration.

 OPTIONAL attributes for the spirit:baseAddress key = attribute name value = attribute value.

Detailed Description

Equals the spirit:master element in IP-Xact specification.

This class also equals the spirit:mirroredMaster element. Contains the elements that define the master interface.
